question:
A scientist wants to produce virus-free plant in tissue culture. Which part of the plant will he use as an explant?
(a) Mature stem
(b) Axillary meristem
(c) Apical meristem
(d) Mesophyll cells
explanation: Meristems (apical and axillary) are generally free of virus. Hence they are used to recover healthy plants from diseased plants.
